title: 6.3 Building a Heap
content:
Section 6.3

Building a Heap

Summary

Convert an unsorted array into a max-heap in O(n) time.

Key Points

  • Start from last non-leaf node, heapify each going up
  • Leaves (n/2+1 to n) are already valid heaps
  • Time: O(n), not O(n log n)!
  • Why O(n)? Most nodes are near leaves where heapify is fast

Pseudocode

BUILD-MAX-HEAP(A):
    heap-size = n
    for i = ⌊n/2⌋ downto 1:
        MAX-HEAPIFY(A, i)

Why It Matters

Enables heapsort and efficient priority queue construction.
